page.title: 10HORTICULTURE - BURGHFIELD
page.content: Mrs Merton lives at the Old Rectory. She has a very big garden with lots of trees and flowers. From May the garden is open to the public and one can also buy plants. There are twelve acres of land. At the front of the house stand two stone lions. There is a swimming pool, two ponds and a tennis court. Three gardeners work there. We saw some beautiful dark velvet pansies and vegetable patches with lots of potatoes. The vegetables from the gardens win lots of prizes at local shows.
